005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.MarkupMultiline;
009
010import java.util.Locale;
011
012import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
013import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
014
015public interface IChoiceGroupInstance
016    extends IModelInstanceAbsolute, IContainerModelGrouped {
017
018  int DEFAULT_CHOICE_GROUP_GROUP_AS_MAX_OCCURS = -1;
019  @NonNull
020  String DEFAULT_JSON_DISCRIMINATOR_PROPERTY_NAME = "object-type";
021
022  /**
023   * {@inheritDoc}
024   *
025   * @see #DEFAULT_CHOICE_GROUP_GROUP_AS_MAX_OCCURS
026   */
027  @Override
028  default int getMaxOccurs() {
029    return DEFAULT_CHOICE_GROUP_GROUP_AS_MAX_OCCURS;
030  }
031
032  /**
033   * Provides the Metaschema model type of "CHOICE".
034   *
035   * @return the model type
036   */
037  @Override
038  default ModelType getModelType() {
039    return ModelType.CHOICE_GROUP;
040  }
041
042  /**
043   * Get the JSON property to use to discriminate between JSON objects.
044   *
045   * @return the discriminator property
046   * @see #DEFAULT_JSON_DISCRIMINATOR_PROPERTY_NAME
047   */
048  @NonNull
049  String getJsonDiscriminatorProperty();
050
051  @Override
052  default boolean isEffectiveValueWrappedInXml() {
053    return true;
054  }
055
056  /**
057   * Get the effective name of the JSON key flag, if a JSON key is configured.
058   * <p>
059   * This name is expected to be in the same namespace as the containing model
060   * element (i.e. choice group, assembly, field).
061   *
062   * @return the name of the JSON key flag if configured, or {@code null}
063   *         otherwise
064   */
065  @Nullable
066  String getJsonKeyFlagInstanceName();
067
068  /**
069   * Get the named model instance for the provided choice group item.
070   *
071   * @param item
072   *          the item to get the instance for
073   * @return the named model instance for the provided choice group item
074   */
075  @NonNull
076  default INamedModelInstanceGrouped getItemInstance(@NonNull Object item) {
077    throw new UnsupportedOperationException("no value");
078  }
079
080  @Override
081  default MarkupMultiline getRemarks() {
082    // no remarks
083    return null;
084  }
085
086  @SuppressWarnings("null")
087  @Override
088  default String toCoordinates() {
089    return String.format("%s-instance:%s:%s/%s@%d",
090        getModelType().toString().toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT),
091        getContainingDefinition().getContainingModule().getShortName(),
092        getContainingDefinition().getName(),
093        getGroupAsName(),
094        hashCode());
095  }
096}
